title: Most commonly reported types of cyber crime 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The highest Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has 49547.0 more Number of complaints than the lowest Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has the highest Number of complaints and Spoofing has the lowest Number of complaints.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The highest Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has 49547.0 more Number of complaints than the lowest Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
Second maximum Number of complaints is found at Cyber Incidents Extortion.
The difference of Number of complaints between the highest and lowest Cyber Incidents is 49547.0.
Number of complaints at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery is 65116.0 , second place is Extortion at 51146.0, and thirdly is Personal data breach at 50642.0.
The lowest value 15569.0 at Spoofing is almost 2.13 times smaller than the average value 30505.36.
